summary: Barbie's modern adventure takes her to Paris, where she makes new friends and meets magical characters that discover their true designer talents and use their inner sparkle to save the day!
cast: Diana Kaarina|Adrian Petriw|Tabitha St. Germain|Patricia Drake|Alexa Devine|Shannon Chan-Kent|Maryke Hendrikse|Kandyse McClure|Britt Irvin|Chiara Zanni|Kelly Metzger|Andrea Libman|Brandy Kopp|Charles Fathy|Annick Obonsawin|Nicole Bouma|Nicole Oliver|Vincent Tong|Cathy Weseluck|Peter New|Peter Kelamis|Michael Dobson|France Perras
title: Barbie: Moda mágica en París
